name: Treverse (Jean Gannett)
description:
Play as an astronaut in search of space treasure! Use your jetpack to navigate uncertain terrain, and try not to get too dizzy if you get a little turned around... :^) This is a game created for a game jam at Auburn University through TigerDev, Auburn's game development club. The creators are as follows:

Jean Gannett - Art Assets, Art Direction

Thomas Mitchell - Programming, Level Design

Scott Conwell - Programming, Level Design
